# Jealous Fork - Miami's Original Artisan Pancake Restaurant
# https://jealousfork.com

> Jealous Fork is an award-winning artisan pancake and gourmet burger restaurant in Miami, Florida.
> Founded by best friends Joaquin Ortiz and Henrik Telle, it evolved from the first artisan pancake food truck in the country.
> Located at 14417 SW 42nd St, Miami, FL 33175 (Kendall area). Phone: (305) 699-1430

## Quick Facts
- Type: Restaurant (Breakfast, Brunch, Burgers)
- Cuisine: American, Artisan Pancakes, Gourmet Burgers
- Price Range: $$ (Moderate, $13-$17 entrees)
- Rating: 4.7 stars on Google (400+ reviews), 4.6 on Yelp
- Reservations: Yes, via Resy or phone
- Parking: Free on-site parking
- Dog-Friendly: Yes, outdoor patio
- Family-Friendly: Yes
- Delivery: Yes, via major platforms
- Online Ordering: Yes, at jealousfork.com

## About
Jealous Fork started as the first artisan pancake food truck in the country. After tremendous success with lines stretching around the block, founders Joaquin Ortiz and Henrik Telle opened a full restaurant in Miami's Kendall neighborhood. Known for Instagram-worthy pancakes and featured on Telemundo National. The restaurant has a 4.7 star Google rating with over 400 reviews.

## Location
14417 SW 42nd St
Miami, FL 33175
United States
Neighborhood: Kendall, Miami-Dade County

## Hours of Operation
- Tuesday: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM (Jealous Fork - Pancakes)
- Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM (Jealous Fork - Pancakes)
- Thursday: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM (Jealous Fork - Pancakes)
- Friday: 9:00 AM - 9:00 PM (Pancakes all day, Burgers 3PM-9PM)
- Saturday: 9:00 AM - 9:00 PM (Pancakes all day, Burgers 3PM-9PM)
- Sunday: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM (Jealous Fork - Pancakes)
- Monday: CLOSED

Note: Jealous Burger operates Friday-Saturday 3PM-9PM alongside our pancake menu. You can order both pancakes AND burgers during burger hours!

## Contact
- Phone: (305) 699-1430
- Website: https://jealousfork.com
- Menu: https://jealousfork.com/full-menu
- Burgers: https://jealousfork.com/burgers
- Reservations: Available through Resy or by phone

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What are Jealous Fork's hours?
A: Tuesday-Thursday and Sunday 9AM-2PM for pancakes. Friday-Saturday we're open 9AM-9PM and serve gourmet burgers from 3PM-9PM. Closed Mondays.

Q: Where is Jealous Fork located?
A: 14417 SW 42nd St, Miami, FL 33175, in the Kendall area of Miami-Dade County.

Q: Does Jealous Fork take reservations?
A: Yes, through Resy or by calling (305) 699-1430. Walk-ins welcome but reservations recommended for weekend brunch.

Q: Is there parking available?
A: Yes, free parking lot available on-site.

Q: Are dogs allowed?
A: Yes, on our outdoor patio. We're dog-friendly!

Q: Does Jealous Fork have gluten-free options?
A: Yes, we offer gluten-free pancake options. Please inform your server.

Q: Is Jealous Fork good for kids?
A: Absolutely! We're a family-friendly restaurant with options for all ages.

Q: What is Jealous Fork known for?
A: Award-winning artisan pancakes, Instagram-worthy presentations, and being the first artisan pancake food truck in America. Featured on Telemundo National.

Q: What are the best pancakes at Jealous Fork?
A: Our most popular: Chocolate Oreo Chip Pancake ($17), Peanut Butter Cup Pancake ($17), Hot Maple Flatbread ($16), and Lemon Curd and Blueberry Pancake ($15).

Q: Does Jealous Fork deliver?
A: Yes, through major delivery platforms and online ordering at jealousfork.com.

## Menu Highlights

### Signature Pancakes (Available All Day)
- Hot Maple Flatbread ($16) - Cup and char pepperoni, double cream mozzarella, and red chili-black pepper maple
- Chocolate Oreo Chip Pancake ($17) - Crushed Oreos, chocolate chips, Oreo whipped cream, chocolate ganache
- Peanut Butter Cup Pancake ($17) - Reese's cups, nutter butter whipped cream, peanut butter maple syrup
- Lemon Curd and Blueberry Pancake ($15) - Light pancakes topped with fresh blueberries and tangy lemon curd
- Banana Walnut Pancake ($17) - Caramelized bananas, toasted walnuts, house-smoked maple syrup

### Gourmet Burgers (Jealous Burger - Friday & Saturday 3PM-9PM)
Miami's best gourmet burgers with classic patties (not smash burgers) and creative toppings. We brought the same creativity from our award-winning pancakes to craft 9 unique burgers. Pancakes still available during burger hours!

- The Classic ($13) - Cheddar Cheese, That Secret Sauce, Tomato, Onion, Spring Greens
- Jesse James ($16) - Applewood Smoked Bacon, Crispy Onions, BBQ Sauce, Cheddar Cheese
- La La Land ($16) - Guac, Tomato, Cilantro, Sunflower Seeds, Dried Cranberries, White Cheddar, Spring Greens
- The Devil's Advocate ($17) - Smokehouse Chili, Cheddar Cheese, Hot Hot Shake First, Fried Egg
- Le French ($17) - Brie Cheese, Caramelized Onions, Framboise, Spring Greens
- The OG JB ($17) - Pickled Onions, Smoked Gouda, Tomato-Poblano Jam
- Billie Holiday ($16) - Maytag Blue Cheese, Caramelized Onions, Spring Greens
- Que Bola Meng ($16) - Guava & Queso, Caramelized Onions, Papitas (Miami-inspired!)
- VEGburger ($16) - Black Bean-Chipotle Patty, Aged White Cheddar, Tomato, Onion, Spring Greens (Vegetarian)

## Dietary Options
- Gluten-free pancakes available
- Vegetarian burger option (VEGburger - black bean-chipotle patty)
- Vegan options available upon request
- Allergy accommodations - please inform your server

## Service Areas
We serve all Miami-Dade County neighborhoods. Distance from our restaurant:

**Kendall Area (Our Home):**
- Kendall (5 min) - Our home neighborhood
- West Kendall (15 min)
- Kendale Lakes (30 min)
- The Crossings (42 min)
- The Hammocks (40 min)

**West Miami-Dade:**
- Westchester (22 min)
- Tamiami (28 min)
- Fontainebleau (28 min)
- Sweetwater (35 min)
- Doral (38 min)
- Olympia Heights (24 min)
- Westwood Lakes (26 min)
- Sunset (25 min)

**Greater Miami:**
- Coral Gables (25 min)
- Little Havana (20 min)
- Coconut Grove (28 min)
- Downtown Miami (12 min)
- Brickell (18 min)
- South Beach (25 min)
- Aventura (35 min)

- First artisan pancake food truck in the United States
